channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Security Verify Privilege
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Security Verify Privilege

item.title: CVE-2022-43893|2024-09-13T18:06:51.646Z -- ibm -- security%20verify%20privilege
item.description: IBM Security Verify Privilege On-Premises 11.5 could allow a privileged user to cause by using a malicious payload. IBM X-Force ID: 240634.

item.title: CVE-2021-38859|2024-09-13T20:14:21.782Z -- ibm -- security%20verify%20privilege
item.description: IBM Security Verify Privilege On-Premises 11.5 could allow a user to obtain version number information using a specially crafted HTTP request that could be used in further attacks against the system. IBM X-Force ID: 207899.

item.title: CVE-2022-22385|2024-09-13T16:12:35.194Z -- ibm -- security%20verify%20privilege
item.description: IBM Security Verify Privilege On-Premises 11.5 could disclose sensitive information to an attacked due to the transmission of data in clear text. IBM X-Force ID: 221962.

item.title: CVE-2022-22380|2024-09-13T18:07:25.196Z -- ibm -- security%20verify%20privilege
item.description: IBM Security Verify Privilege On-Premises 11.5 could allow an attacker to spoof a trusted entity due to improperly validating certificates. IBM X-Force ID: 221957.

item.title: CVE-2022-43892|2024-09-13T18:06:34.596Z -- ibm -- security%20verify%20privilege
item.description: IBM Security Verify Privilege On-Premises 11.5 does not validate, or incorrectly validates, a certificate which could disclose sensitive information which could aid further attacks against the system. IBM X-Force ID: 240455.

item.title: CVE-2021-20581|2024-09-13T20:15:58.984Z -- ibm -- security%20verify%20privilege
item.description: IBM Security Verify Privilege On-Premises 11.5 could allow a user to obtain sensitive information due to insufficient session expiration. IBM X-Force ID: 199324.

item.title: CVE-2022-22384|2024-09-13T16:16:06.591Z -- ibm -- security%20verify%20privilege
item.description: IBM Security Verify Privilege On-Premises 11.5 could allow an attacker to modify messages returned from the server due to hazardous input validation. IBM X-Force ID: 221961.

item.title: CVE-2022-22375|2024-09-13T20:18:45.483Z -- ibm -- security%20verify%20privilege
item.description: IBM Security Verify Privilege On-Premises 11.5 could allow a remote authenticated attacker to execute arbitrary commands on the system by sending a specially crafted request. IBM X-Force ID: 221681.

item.title: CVE-2022-43889|2024-09-13T18:50:11.882Z -- ibm -- security%20verify%20privilege
item.description: IBM Security Verify Privilege On-Premises 11.5 could disclose sensitive information through an HTTP request that could aid an attacker in further attacks against the system. IBM X-Force ID: 240452.

item.title: CVE-2022-43891|2024-09-13T18:06:17.597Z -- ibm -- security%20verify%20privilege
item.description: IBM Security Verify Privilege On-Premises 11.5 could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information when a detailed technical error message is returned in the browser. This information could be used in further attacks against the system. IBM X-Force ID: 240454.

item.title: CVE-2022-22386|2024-09-13T16:14:52.599Z -- ibm -- security%20verify%20privilege
item.description: IBM Security Verify Privilege On-Premises 11.5 could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by the failure to properly enable HTTP Strict Transport Security. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to obtain sensitive information using man in the middle techniques. IBM X-Force ID: 221963.

item.title: CVE-2021-29913|2024-09-13T18:07:08.016Z -- ibm -- security%20verify%20privilege
item.description: IBM Security Verify Privilege On-Premise 11.5 could allow an authenticated user to obtain sensitive information or perform unauthorized actions due to improper input validation. IBM X-Force ID: 207898.

item.title: CVE-2022-22377|2024-09-13T16:17:43.723Z -- ibm -- security%20verify%20privilege
item.description: IBM Security Verify Privilege On-Premises 11.5 could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by the failure to properly enable HTTP Strict Transport Security. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to obtain sensitive information using man in the middle techniques. IBM X-Force ID: 221827.

item.title: CVE-2024-31887|2024-06-04T17:36:55.759Z -- ibm -- security%20verify%20privilege
item.description: IBM Security Verify Privilege 11.6.25 could allow an unauthenticated actor to obtain sensitive information from the SOAP API. IBM X-Force ID: 287651.

item.title: CVE-2024-31887|2024-08-02T01:59:50.153Z -- ibm -- security%20verify%20privilege
item.description: IBM Security Verify Privilege 11.6.25 could allow an unauthenticated actor to obtain sensitive information from the SOAP API. IBM X-Force ID: 287651.
